RelatedSentence: Days after a deal by state lawmakers cleared the way for eel fisheries in Connecticut , a 15 - state regional agency proposed to ease rules allowing broader access to the multimillion - dollar global eel market .

Days after a deal by state lawmakers cleared the way for eel fisheries in Connecticut , a 15 - state regional agency proposed to ease rules allowing broader access to the multimillion - dollar global eel market .

Days after a deal by state lawmakers cleared the way for eel fisheries in Connecticut , a 15 - state regional agency proposed to ease rules allowing broader access to the multimillion - dollar global eel market .
Rep. Craig A. Miner , R - Litchfield , engineered the legislative deal .
